66591.「あニャ？ そこにいるのは\n <pc>じゃないかニャ。:
Huh? <pc>? Is that you over there,
meow?

66592.「なんで キサマが ここにいるニャ？\n もしかして オレの追っかけを\n 始め:
Why are mew here? Have you been following
me, meow?

66593.「……まあいいニャ。\n ヒマしてたとこだから 話があるなら\n 聞いてやっても:
Well, whatever... I've got nothin' going on
at the moment, so...if you have something
on your mind, go ahead and tell me, meow.

66594.<pc>は キャット・バルバドと\nリューデという ふたりの勇士の子孫を\n探し:
<pc> explained that they were
looking for the descendants of two brave
warriors named Purrseidon and Ryude.

66595.「……ふむ。確かに キャット・バルバドさまは\n オレのご先祖さまニャ。そして:
Mmm hmm... Well, Purrseidon is indeed my ancestor, meow. And in my family, this phrase has been passed down for generations,
meow...

66596.「輝くマントを求める者 現れし時\n 勇士の血を引きし ふたりの者\n いさかい:
"When shehe who seeks the radiant cloak appears, the two who bear the blood of warriors must rest their quarreling hands, and
join as one."

66597.「そして 永遠の地下迷宮の広間にて\n ともに 祈りを捧げよ。\n さすれば 海:
"Then, purr-ay together within the halls of
the Labyrinth of Eternity. Only then will the
way to the Sea's Chasm will reveal itself..."

66598.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫が 誰なのか\n 気にはニャっていたが アヤツを見たとき:
I wondered who the descendant of the other
warrior was, but when I saw him...that's when
it hit me, meow.

66599.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫は\n あの ヒューザとかいう\n ムカつくヤツに ちが:
The other warrior's descendant is none other
than that despicable Hyuza, meow!

66600.「だが 残念だったニャ <pc>ーー！！: But too bad for yooooou, meow!

66601.「あの 泥くさい小魚野郎のヒューザは\n オレが やっつけちまったのニャー！！:
I defeated that flopping little fish like it
was nothing, meow!

66602.「……その出会いは 偶然だったニャ。\n 旅の身空の者同士。ここで会ったが百年目:
Our meeting was by pure chance, meow... After a hundred years, two wanderers met here. Without either of us saying a word, we
drew our swords, meow.

66603.「時が止まったかのような にらみ合い。\n だが ひきょうなことに アヤツは\n:
It was like time itself stood still, meow.
But then he got the idea to throw catnip at
me! A cat's biggest weakness, meow!

66604.「オレは とろんとする 身体をふるい立たせ！\n アヤツの剣を 右に！ 左に！:
Quickly I snapped out of my stupor!
I grrrracefully evaded his quick slashes!

66605.「アヤツの 一瞬のスキを狙い！\n キャット剣法の秘奥義 キャット空中大車輪を\:
I took advantage of that brief opening and
unleashed the purr-fect comeback! The
Cat's Cartwheel!

66606.「それで アヤツは ジ・エンドだったニャ。\n ニャーッハッハッハッ。: And that was game over for him. Nya-hahaha!

66607.「……というわけで ヒューザは\n もう この世には いニャいが\n 安心するの: Rest assured, Hyuza is no more, meow.

66608.「アヤツなんか いなくても オレが祈れば\n 海淵の間への道を開くことなど 猫飯:
I can purr-ay without him to open the way to
the Sea's Chasm. You can join me in purr-ayer
if you want, meow.

66609.「そうと決まれば さっそく\n 永遠の地下迷宮の広間へ 向かうニャ。\n <pc:
I'll be on my way to the Labyrinth of Eternity
when I feel like going, meow. You should
hurry on over there, too.

66610.「ニャッ？ やっと 来たかニャ。: Well, look who decided to show up, meow.

66611.「<cs_pchero>が来るのが おそいんで\n ちょっと奥で 狩りをしてたニ:
You were taking your time, so I went a bit
further in to do some hunting, meow.

66612.「……ふむ。\n たしか 海淵の間への道が開く場所は\n あっちの方だニャ。つい:
Hmmm...I think the path to the Sea's Chasm
is over this way, meow. Follow me.

66613.「それニャあ さっそく 剣をかかげて\n 祈ってみるかニャ。せっかくだから\n:
I'll raise my sword and start purr-aying. You
might as well help me since you're here too,
meow.

66614.リベリオは 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。:
Purrgatroyd raised his sword and began
purr-aying.

66617.「……ニャハハハッ。ダメみたいだニャー。\n これはもう キサマは 王者になれな:
Nya-hahaha-ha! Guess it's a wash, meow.
Looks like you've got no choice but to give up
on becoming the Sovereign now, meow.

66618.「……ニャッ？ オレのせいじゃないニャ！\n キサマが もっと早く 王者のマント:
...meow? It's not MY fault! You should've
come to me earlier to get that cloak, meow!

66619.「そしたら あの小魚野郎のヒューザを\n 殺すこともなく ご先祖さまの教えの通り:
Then I wouldn't have had to kill that little
minnow and could've helped you out, meow!
Just how my ancestors taught me!

66622.「ちょっと 猫島に寄ったら <cs_pchero>が\n オレを探してるって ネ:
I briefly stopped by Cat Island and heard from the other cats that was looking for me. So I went out of my way
to find you.

66623.「で？ なんで オレが\n ブタネコに 殺されたことになってるんだ？:
Well? Why is a hairball like you going around
saying you killed me?

66624.「確かに ちょっと前にバッタリ会って\n お前と やり合ったが すぐに しっぽを:
Who was it who bumped into me and tried to
start a fight, only to run away like a cat
with its tail tucked between its legs? Hmm?

66625.「ぬぬぬぬ……。うるさいニャ！\n ちょっと お茶目なウソをついただけニャッ。:
Grrrrr.... Shut up, meow! I just told a little
white lie, that's all!

66626.「今は ブタネコと コントやってる\n 場合じゃねえんだよな <cs_pcher:
You've got better things to do than play
around with fat hairballs, <cs_pchero>.
You're after the Sovereign's Cloak, right?

66627.「オレに そんなチカラがあるとは思えないし\n 無駄かもしれねえが やるだけやっ:
I don't think I've got that kind of power to
help you, but I'll still give it a try. It is
for your sake, after all.

66628.「おい ブタネコ。\n オレたちで 何をすればいいんだ？:
Hey, hairball. What are we supposed to do
here?

66629.「ブタネコって言うの やめろニャ！\n ふたりで 同時に剣をかかげて\n 祈りを:
Stop callin' me hairball, meow! We both gotta
raise our swords up and purr-ay at the same
time, meow!

66630.「ふん……。それじゃ さっさとやるぞ。:
Hmm..."purr-ay" you say. Well, let's get on
with it then.

66631.ヒューザと リベリオは\nともに 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。:
Hyuza and Purrgatroyd both raised their swords
and began to purr-ay.

66632.なんと 広間の床が 光りはじめ\n旅の扉が 現れた！:
Suddenly, the chamber's floor began to glow,
revealing a teleportal!

66633.「へえ おどろいたな……。\n オレに こんなことが できるなんてな。:
Huh, wasn't expecting that...
Didn't think I had it in me.

66634.「ご先祖さまの言葉には 続きがあったのを\n 思いだしたニャ。:
I just remembered that there was more to what
my ancestors told me, meow...

66635.「海淵の間への道は 奥深き迷宮。\n 果てなき向こうに待つは 強大なる守護者なり:
"The path to the Sea's Chasm is a deep labyrinth. What awaits beyond its endless corridors lies a mighty guardian..."
I think that was it, meow...

66636.「なんだか知らねえが ここから先は\n お前がやらなきゃ 意味のないことなんだろ:
I'm not really sure what's going on, but I'm
assuming it's on you from here, right? Well,
that's fine. You're more than capable.

66637.「オレは 旅の途中の身だ。\n お前の帰りは 待たないからな。\n それじゃ ま:
I'm on the road right now, so I won't wait up.
I'm sure we'll run into each other again
eventually!

69782.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armor enveloped in a bright light descends
from high above...
